channel.title: Hearts of Wulin: Inn of the Drifting Lotus
channel.description:
![WuxigeT|328x500](upload://5sWeQT9C92IGViHeQXy2gboVGVN.png)
This is a series of four sessions of Hearts of Wulin by Agatha Cheng and Lowell Francis. Hearts of Wulin is a Powered by the Apocalypse game about martial arts melodrama, inspired by wuxia media such as Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon, or the films of the Shaw Brothers. The game is still in development - having just completed a successful kickstarter - and we will be using the most recent playtest package to run the game.
For this series, I would like to give preference to newer players, particularly those who have yet to play in a Gauntlet series. Please only sign up initially if you have joined the Gauntlet patreon in May or June, or have yet to play in a game. Though once we have hit the Open Access date, anyone can sign up. Each session must be signed up for individually. The sessions are scheduled for three hours. They will be recorded, and uploaded to YouTube with the consent of all participants.
On a languid evening in high summer, four travelers make a stop at the Inn of the Drifting Lotus. Whether by fate or design, all four are members of the wulin, inextricably linked by the past and future. This chance encounter at the inn will lead to something more, as romance, rivalries, duty and vengeance test the resolve of these staunch warriors.
This game will be run in accordance with [the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html). We will have a tone and content discussion before the game begins, including setting out lines and veils. The [Script Change](http://tinyurl.com/nphed7m) and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg) safety tools will be in use while we play.
